RPGGrid.actor
Class RPGWorld

java.lang.Object
  RPGGrid.world.World<RPGGrid.actor.Actor>
      RPGGrid.actor.RPGWorld

public class RPGWorld
extends RPGGrid.world.World<RPGGrid.actor.Actor>

An ActorWorld is occupied by actors.
This class is not tested on the AP CS A and AB exams.

          Constructs an actor world with a default grid.
